text:
Hey Team,
I have to implement new page on HubSpot. Basically, I need to show some post*(but this is not a blog page)* and when user click on that post then user should land on details page. So, there is any free template are available on HubSpot or do I need to create the custom template for this. If, I need to create custom template then how we can get the post and and link with details page.
Kindly guide me.
Thank you

Hi there! :smile:

I have a client who are very keen to build an ROI calculator to share with their audience via paid ads. I was looking into the building of the ROI calculator & it seems like it’s a bit more technical than I expected to tailor it to their needs.

Is there a possibility of receiving a template from HubSpot where we could just plug in the details or will it need to be build from scratch?

Generally calculator functionality needs to be custom built, because no two companies have the same products, billing frequency, options etc.

If you are not a developer and don’t have on on your team I’d suggest posting in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> with a description of your project and some devs in our community looking for a project will reach out

We just started using a no-code tool called Outgrow that helps spin things like this up fairly quickly. I believe Typeform can do calculations, too.
<https://outgrow.co/>
That’s a pretty nifty looking tool. Good share there Adam!
